English: Welcome to the first wonder, the great Pyramid of Giza. Press 'Enter' to continue  Move using left/a or right/s and up/w to jump. Press 'Esc' to pause (Yes, we were this advanced)   To unccover the secrets located in Egypt, you must find a way inside the pyramid!
French: Bienvenue bla bla, the great Pyramid of Giza. Press 'Enter' to continue  Déplacement bla bla left/a or right/s and up/w to jump. Press 'Esc' to pause (Yes, we were this advanced)   Pour déceller les secrets bla bla, you must find a way inside the pyramid!
